text:
Twine Labs | http://twinelabs.com | Philadelphia or REMOTE | INTERNS

Twine builds software that matches employees with the right new roles inside their companies - we help Fortune 1000 firms retain top talent and save millions on hiring and training. Powering our software is a suite of matching algorithms that improve over time using statistical learning. We're a bootstrapped HR analytics startup, early but with revenue and funding.

We're hiring for a full-stack developer. Youâ€™ll be responsible for building key components of our enterprise software product, and you'll lead the development of our web application (Django/Postgres).

Email us at team@twinelabs.com with a brief (1 paragraph) description of your interest.
